title: Large Studio Apartment close to University Circle
posting_body: Third floor apartment in the Larchmere Arts District.
Less than 2 miles from University Circle.
This is a full apartment with front and rear stairwell entrances.
It features a FULL kitchen, large living room area, 1 bedroom and an extra office or computer room.
Kitchen comes with stove, refrigerator and dishwasher.
Includes use of washer/dryer in basement plus one parking space in the driveway.
Tenant pays electric (separate meter) and a monthly water-sewer fee.
Small pets are OK with pet deposit
Previous tenants include law students, medical residents, graduate students at Case and Cleveland State.
This is a quiet house on a quiet street and is perfect for the right person.
Minutes to CWRU, Case Western Reserve University, University Circle, University Hospital, Cleveland Clinic, CIA, John Carroll University, JCU, and the Museums.
